item.title: Running Comrades 2018 for Wildlands Trust
item.description: The Story Friends, Family and Random Visitors, I would like to ask you for a favour: On the 4th of November 2017, after having run two previous marathons, I finally ran a time that qualified me for a spot in the 2 Oceans Ultra Marathon 2018, and the Comrades Marathon 2018. For the next 3 months - March, April and May - a huge volume of kilometers will be run in order to prepare for running the 91km from Pietermaritzburg down to Durban.
